traits.name: Keen Smell
traits.desc: The rat has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.desc: The rat has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the rat's allies is within 5 ft. of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.
